heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Maternity Protection, Employment
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Maternity Protection, Employment 
Equality and Preservation of Certain Records Act 2024 (Commencement) Order
text_norm: 1 order may cited maternity protection employment equality preservation certain record act 2024 (commencement) order

title: Act 2024 (No. 37 of 2024) (other than section 6), insofar as it is not already in
Act 2024 (No. 37 of 2024) (other than section 6), insofar as it is not already in
heading: 2. The 20th day of November 2024 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 20th day of November 2024 is appointed as the day on which the 
Maternity Protection, Employment Equality and Preservation of Certain Records 
Act 2024 (No. 37 of 2024) (other than section 6), insofar as it is not already in 
operation, shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

18 November, 2024. 

RODERIC O'GORMAN, 

Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and 
Youth. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 19th November, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [630] 3
